stories.headline: Deadly Practice? Cosmetic Surgery
stories.summary: A woman overdoses from anesthetic during liposuction, highlighting issues with cosmetic surgeries in doctor offices and lack of regulation.

stories.headline: Legal Drug Hazards Inside the FDA
stories.summary: A personal investigation into the pharmaceutical industry reveals safety issues and prompts an FDA investigation.

stories.headline: Naming the Unknown
stories.summary: Investigation into the identity of the Vietnam era Unknown Soldier using military databases leads to the exhumation and identification of Lieutenant Michael Joseph Blassie.

stories.headline: Counting Crime Right
stories.author_name: Mark Fazlollah, Craig R. McCoy and Michael Matza
stories.summary: The FBI crime report exposes Philadelphia's statistical falsification, uncovering significant underreporting of crime in the city.

stories.headline: Digging up Submarines
stories.summary: Investigation into submarine espionage during the Cold War, utilizing both traditional and modern research tools to uncover hidden military operations.
